On Sep 16, 2009, at 5:12 PM, Bill Burke wrote:

> http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc5023.txt
>
> "Atom Publishing Protocol"
>
> What, is calling AtomPub just Atom bad etiquette?

Not bad etiquette, but completely incorrect. Even AtomPub has nothing  
to do with pub/sub or messaging. It is a just a specialized  
application protocol.

Subbu
